smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

smells.name: ComplexInterface

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

instances.message: This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.

smells.name: ForbiddenComment
smells.description: Flags a forbidden comment. Defaults values are TODO:, FIXME: or STOPSHIP:

instances.message: This comment contains text that has been defined as forbidden in detekt.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (notifiedFolder.color == existingFolder.color) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: notifiedFolder.color == existingFolder.color
Parentheses in (notifiedFolder.timestamp == existingFolder.timestamp) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: notifiedFolder.timestamp == existingFolder.timestamp
Parentheses in (notifiedFolder.updateTimestamp == existingFolder.updateTimestamp) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: notifiedFolder.updateTimestamp == existingFolder.updateTimestamp

Parentheses in (extra == null
            || extra.getBoolean(SettingsOptionsBottomSheet.KEY_MARKDOWN_ENABLED, true)
            || data.forcedMarkdown) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: extra == null
            || extra.getBoolean(SettingsOptionsBottomSheet.KEY_MARKDOWN_ENABLED, true)
            || data.forcedMarkdown
Parentheses in (this.updateTimestamp != 0L) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: this.updateTimestamp != 0L
Parentheses in (this.timestamp != null) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: this.timestamp != null
Parentheses in (this.updateTimestamp != 0L) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: this.updateTimestamp != 0L
Parentheses in (this.timestamp != null) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: this.timestamp != null
Parentheses in (uiVisibility or View.SYSTEM_UI_FLAG_IMMERSIVE_STICKY) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: uiVisibility or View.SYSTEM_UI_FLAG_IMMERSIVE_STICKY
Parentheses in (historyIndex - 1) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: historyIndex - 1
Parentheses in (historyIndex + 1) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: historyIndex + 1
Parentheses in (0xFFD32F2F) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: 0xFFD32F2F
Parentheses in (minutes / 60) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: minutes / 60
Parentheses in (count - 1) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: count - 1
Parentheses in (count + 1) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: count + 1

smells.name: VarCouldBeVal
smells.description: Var declaration could be val.

instances.message: Variable 'isSameAsExisting' could be val.
Variable 'isSameAsExisting' could be val.
Variable 'contentView' could be val.

smells.name: UnnecessaryAbstractClass
smells.description: An abstract class is unnecessary and can be refactored. An abstract class should have both abstract and concrete properties or functions. An abstract class without a concrete member can be refactored to an interface. An abstract class without an abstract member can be refactored to a concrete class.

smells.name: SerialVersionUIDInSerializableClass
smells.description: A class which implements the Serializable interface does not define a correct serialVersionUID field. The serialVersionUID field should be a constant long value inside a companion object.
